author: rse
msg: Make sure "make install" works correctly (i.e. runs apxs_install target) under
USE_APXS=1. This was broken because USE_APXS=1 forced NO_HTTPD=1 and thus this

author: rse
msg: The E<copy> is not understood by all POD backends, especially not by the NRoff
backend which is used at the standard build.  I replace it by a text variant.
If a © should be used for HTML please use a ``=for HTML'' section.

author: rse
msg: Completely update INSTALL.apaci according to our recent changes. Look fine and
the DSO stuff is declared as EXPERIMENTAL. Be conservative...

author: rse
msg: Make abbrev. read as at the other locations, i.e. in upper case.

author: rse
msg: Make sure mod_include is compiled with Perl's ccflags.  Its really a design
flaw in Apache's Makefile mechanism that there is no way to specify build
flags which apply only to a particular set of modules.
